resources.string: Get everyday food plan according to your health condition.
Let the app reminds you to take food in time before breakfast, lunch, snacks and dinner.
See charts of carbohydrates, Protein, Fat, Vegetables, Leaves, Fruits and other food items which have equivalent nutrients.
Search and find nutritional facts of different foods.
Get health tips and suggestions from doctors and nutritionists.
Find hospitals nearer to you in the map.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
